snippet.title: OPSD: Operation Space Defense
snippet.description:
OPSD: Operation Space Defense is the original source material of Sierra Ops game, and is also our first game! :) 
Download OPSD here: https://helrouis.itch.io/operation-sd-space-defense

Sierra Ops Episode 1 is available for free here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/364210/Sierra_Ops/

Support the development of future episodes by buying the Season Pass, and save 40%!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1217401/Sierra_Ops_Season_Pass/

Follow Sierra Ops updates here:
https://twitter.com/sierralunabot
